data.name: Happy Empire - A Bouquet for the Princess: Enhanced Edition Demo
data.detailed_description:
We are proud to present our new game – Happy Empire - A Bouquet for the Princess: Enhanced Edition Demo with first levels and about one hour of gameplay.

In this strategy/adventure game, Princess Leya and Prince Hervald go across their homeland that was damaged during the last war. During their journey, they will face enemy minions and meet good and evil heroes. They will have to struggle, cooperate with different characters, trade, develop the cities and manage their resources smart. And they will face a lot of challenges and obstacles on their way.

This game will touch feeling of both boys and girls. Arcana and challenges are intertwined in a single story of the Happy Empire - A Bouquet for the Princess: Enhanced Edition game.

More About the Game:


  • Colorful graphics
  • Great emotions!!!
  • Game as part of a big story with rich storyline
  • 4 amazing worlds to visit
  • 64 unique levels

Help Princess Leya and Prince Hervald in their challenging journey and struggle for the Empire!

data.short_description: Struggle, develop, meet good and evil heroes and progress through the Empire by using their help. Let the story end happily! Defeat the Evil Wizard and his minions and return home victorious! Demo with first levels and about one hour of gameplay.

fullgame.name: Happy Empire - A Bouquet for the Princess: Enhanced Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 Mb
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 Mb
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
